Articles.Content: I am unable to get any menu system other than the main menu. When I load up the options it has two columns and the only way I know what I am doing is when I am hovering over the selected answer. this also happens in game when building the ship and/or rocket; I cannot see the navigational menu to the left of the parts area. I really really enjoyed the demo and I bought this game last night and It isn't cooperating at all. I can't do the training because that is also bugged

Hi @Farmerbubba, please take a look at this thread, we'll need more info.

Thank you.
